name: Later that Night
description:
This is a game I made with my parents for MiniJam #8 (https://itch.io/jam/mini-jam-8-fantasy)

The theme was fantasy (PG-13 or lower) and it had a limitation of game play in only one room.  The download is a stand-alone executable for Windows only.

The game was made with GameMaker 8.1 Lite.  I made most of the sprites, animations and programming.

We joined at the middle of the jam period, 1.5 days after starting.  So the current status of the game  was achieved in 1.5 days, minus hours of sleep, of course.

In the game info (red info icon) you will find links to the third-party sprites and sounds.
